name: 6-1 Wave Loading + Rest-Pause (~15 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: Each wave ~6 sets x 15-30s rest => ~4 min + ~2 min rest. 2 waves => ~12-15 min total
overview_and_execution: Start at ~80% 1RM for 6 reps, rest ~15s, add weight for 5 reps, rest ~15s, continue down to 1 rep. Optionally do a second wave with slightly heavier loads. Increase weights in small increments (2â€“3%) each mini-set as reps decrease.
example_application: Wave 1: 6 reps @ 200 lbs, rest 15s, 5 reps @ 205 lbs, rest 15s, 4 reps @ 210 lbs, etc., down to 1 rep ~ 220 lbs. Rest 2 min, repeat a second wave if possible.
important_notes: Stay within safe rep targets. If failing a rep, reduce weight in the next mini-set.
